CustomField.description: The default owner for the quote/proposal created from an opportunity. Valid values are Opportunity Owner and Current User. If not set, the Opportunity Owner will become the owner of the new quote/proposal.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The default owner for the quote/proposal created from an opportunity. Valid values are Opportunity Owner and Current User. If not set, the Opportunity Owner will become the owner of the new quote/proposal.
CustomField.label: Default Opportunity Quote Owner
